type.title: _type
type.description: The type of panel to use.

caption.title: caption
caption.description: The caption to use for the panel.

cypher.title: cypher
cypher.description: A reference to a cypher from the cypher section of the configuration.

details_cypher.title: details_cypher
details_cypher.description: A reference to a cypher from the cypher section of the configuration. Must return ``details``. Used in the details section of the panel, as a table.

markdown.title: markdown
markdown.description: The markdown to use for the panel. Only used for type ``markdown``.
examples:
.. code-block:: markdown

                    ## Affects

                    Versions x.x.x - x.x.x

                    ## Recommended action

                    Upgrade to the latest version of the software.

.. code-block:: yaml

                  markdown_settings:
                    variables:
                      - name: cves
                        cypher: cves-total

metric.title: metric
metric.description: The statsd metric to send from the panel data. Only used for ``count`` and ``progress`` panels.

params.title: params
params.description: A list of parameters to send into the query. The parameters can directly have values, or can be a reference to an input.
examples:
.. code-block:: yaml

                  params:
                    - name: severity
                      input_id: cve_base_severity
                    - name: integrityImpact
                      value: HIGH

table_id.title: table_id
table_id.description: The cypher attribute to use for the table's unique ID, if using a type of table or vertical-table. If not set, a random ID will be generated. A table_id should be set for ``vertical-table``, or the panel will have a random ID used as the caption.

legend.title: legend
legend.description: The type of legend to use; ``row`` or ``column``. If unset, then no legend will be used.

variables.title: variables
variables.description: Variables to inject into markdoc, for use within the markdown.

cypher.title: cypher
cypher.description: A reference to a cypher from the cypher section of the configuration.

name.title: name
name.description: The variable name to be used within the markdown.

params.title: params
params.description: A list of parameters to send into the query. The parameters can directly have values. Currently does not support inputs.

cypher.title: cypher
cypher.description: The cypher to use for the scheduled query.

enabled.title: enabled
enabled.description: Whether the scheduled query should be enabled. If not set, the scheduled query will be enabled.

frequency.title: frequency
frequency.description: The frequency of the scheduled query in minutes. Mutually exclusive with ``watch_scans``.

name.title: name
name.description: The name of the scheduled query.

params.title: params
params.description: A dictionary of parameters to pass to the cypher query. The keys are the variable names, and the values are the values to pass.
examples:
.. code-block:: yaml

                  params:
                    - name: syncedtype
                      value:
                        - recent
                    - name: base_severity
                      value:
                        - HIGH
                        - CRITICAL

watch_scans.title: watch_scans
watch_scans.description: The scans to watch for the scheduled query. Based on SyncMetadata. Query will triger if any of the watched scans listed are updated. Mutually exclusive with ``frequency``.
examples:
.. code-block:: yaml

                  watch_scans:
                    - grouptype: CVE
                      syncedtype: recent
                    - grouptype: CVE
                      syncedtype: modified

action_config.description: The configuration for the action. See the documentation for the relevant scheduled query module for information about the configuration needed for each action type.
examples:
.. code-block:: yaml

                      action_config:
                        webhook_url: https://hooks.slack.com/services/T00000000/B00000000/XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

action_type.title: action_type
action_type.description: The type of action to perform.

name.title: name
name.description: The parameter name to use when passing this input into the query.

value.description: The parameter value to pass into the query.
examples:
.. code-block:: yaml

                      params:
                        - name: integrityImpact

groupid.title: groupid
groupid.description: Match against the groupid attribute of the SyncMetadata node, as a regex. If not set, the query will match against ``.*``.

grouptype.title: grouptype
grouptype.description: Match against the grouptype attribute of the SyncMetadata node, as a regex. If not set, the query will match against ``.*``.

syncedtype.title: syncedtype
syncedtype.description: Match against the syncedtype attribute of the SyncMetadata node, as a regex. If not set, the query will match against ``.*``.

queries.title: queries
queries.description: The queries to use for the report.
examples:
.. code-block:: yaml

                  queries:
                    cves-severity-of-total: |-
                      MATCH (c:CVE)
                      WITH COUNT(DISTINCT c.id) AS denominator
                      MATCH (c:CVE)
                      WHERE c.base_severity = "CRITICAL"
                      RETURN count(DISTINCT c.id) AS numerator, denominator
                    cves-by-severity: |-
                      MATCH (c:CVE)
                      WHERE c.base_severity = $base_severity
                      RETURN count(c.id) AS count
                    cves: |-
                      MATCH (c:CVE)
                      WHERE c.base_severity =~ ($base_severity)
                      RETURN {
                        cve_id: c.id,
                        base_severity: c.base_severity,
                        severity: c.severity,
                        description: c.description
                      } AS details
                      ORDER BY details.severity DESC
                    recent-cves: |-
                      MATCH (s:SyncMetadata)
                      WHERE s.grouptype = "CVE" AND s.syncedtype IN $syncedtype
                      WITH datetime({epochSeconds: s.lastupdated}) - duration({hours: 24}) AS feedupdatetime
                      MATCH (c:CVE)
                      WHERE (datetime(c.published_date) > feedupdatetime AND c.base_severity IN $base_severity
                      RETURN {
                        id: c.id,
                        base_severity: c.base_severity,
                        base_score: c.base_score,
                        description: c.description_en
                      } AS details

dashboard.description: The dashboard to use for the report.
examples:
.. code-block:: yaml

                  dashboard:
                    rows:
                      - name: CVEs by severity as percentage of total
                        panels:
                          - cypher: cves-severity-of-total
                            type: progress
                            params:
                              - name: base_severity
                                value: CRITICAL
                            caption: Critical CVEs
                            size: 2
                      - name: CVEs by severity
                        panels:
                          - cypher: cves-by-severity
                            type: count
                            params:
                              - name: base_severity
                                value: CRITICAL
                              caption: Critical CVEs
                            size: 2
                          - cypher: cves-by-severity
                            type: count
                            params:
                              - name: base_severity
                                value: HIGH
                            caption: High CVEs
                            size: 2

reports.title: reports
reports.description: The reports to use for the report.
examples:
.. code-block:: yaml

                  reports:
                    cves:
                      name: CVEs
                      inputs:
                        - input_id: cve_base_severity
                          cypher: |-
                            MATCH (c:CVE)
                            RETURN c.base_severity AS base_severity
                          default:
                            label: (all)
                            value: .*
                          label: Base Severity
                          type: autocomplete
                          size: 2
                      rows:
                        - name: CVEs
                          panels:
                            - cypher: cves
                              type: table
                              params:
                                - name: severity
                                  input_id: cve_base_severity
                              size: 12

scheduled_queries.description: The scheduled queries to use for the report.
examples:

                    cves-by-severity:
                      name: CVEs by severity
                      frequency: 1440
                      watch_scans:
                        - grouptype: CVE
                          syncedtype: recent
                      actions:
                        - action_type: slack
                          title: Recently published HIGH/CRITICAL CVEs
                          initial_comment: |
                            The following HIGH/CRITICAL CVEs have been published in the last 24 hours.
                          channels:
                            - C0000000000
